attributes.additional_details: This will help the flow of traffic every day, as well as lowering the pollution in the area and making the road safer for all users
attributes.background: Build a bypass for aylebury to ease the traffic from the a41. The town has grown exponentially since the ring road was originally built and the road simply cannot cope with the volume of traffic trying to use it. The construction of hundreds of new houses along this road will only add to this.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local roads are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
